javascript:!function(){var e={};e.copyToClipboard=void 0,e.copyToClipboard=function(t,e,n){var i;n&&((i=n.createElement("button")).setAttribute("style",["position: fixed","top: 0px","left: 0px","z-index: 99999","background: lightgreen","border: 2px solid black","border: color: black","letter-spacing: normal","word-spacing: normal","text-transform: none","text-indent: 0px","text-shadow: none","display: inline-block","text-align: center","cursor: default","box-sizing: border-box","margin: 0em","font: 400 20pt Arial"].join(";")),i.textContent=e,n.body.appendChild(i),i.onclick=function(){var e,o;"function"==typeof(null===(e=navigator.clipboard)||void 0===e?void 0:e.writeText)?navigator.clipboard.writeText(t).then(function(){console.log("Content copied to clipboard")},function(){console.log("Failed to copy content to clipboard")}):(console.log("Attempting old-school copy"),(o=n.createElement("textarea")).setAttribute("style","width: 0px; height:0px"),n.body.appendChild(o),o.value=t,setTimeout(function(){o.select(),o.setSelectionRange(0,99999),n.execCommand("copy"),n.body.removeChild(o)},1)),n.body.removeChild(i)})};var o=document.title.replace(/[\|\[\(\]\)]/g," ").replace(/\s+/g," ").trim(),t=document.location.href,n=new Date,i=n.getTimezoneOffset(),l=(n=new Date(n.getTime()-60*i*1e3)).toISOString().split("T")[0];e.copyToClipboard("- "+l+" ["+o+"]("+t+")","Copy Page URL to Clipboard",document)}();
